Definitely recommend this game. Played counter strike source for over 1000 hours and this is a great addition. More of a skill based game just like source and a pretty good learning curve if you never played source.
Game is nice and requires knowledge of the whereabouts of the maps and where the enemy team likes to hide. Very good game. I paid 20$ for this game however and now it's free :/

Great game, if you like 1st person shooters you will like this. Arguably the best and longest lasting FPS. Will take slight getting used but you will find others going through the same thing as you. Buying prime is a must.
